description: This file defines the AuthService class that provides authentication functionalities using FirebaseAuth, including sign-in, sign-up, sign-out, and observing auth state changes. It acts as an abstraction layer over FirebaseAuth, adding checks for Firebase initialization status via FirebaseService.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class that handles user authentication operations via FirebaseAuth, including sign-in, sign-up, sign-out, and auth state stream.

methods.name: authStateChanges
methods.description: Returns a stream of authentication state changes; emits null if Firebase is not initialized.

methods.name: signInWithEmail
methods.description: Attempts to sign in a user with provided email and password; returns null if Firebase is not initialized.

methods.name: signUpWithEmail
methods.description: Creates a new user with provided email and password; returns null if Firebase is not initialized.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Signs out the current user; no-op if Firebase is not initialized.

methods.name: currentUser
methods.description: Returns the current Firebase User object or null if not initialized.
